mapper.select: SELECT ur.id id, ur.create_time createTime, ur.name name, ur.url url, ur.description description, ur.category_id categoryId FROM UMS_ADMIN_ROLE_RELATION UAR LEFT JOIN UMS_ROLE_RESOURCE_RELATION URR ON UAR.ROLE_ID = URR.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN UMS_RESOURCE UR ON URR.RESOURCE_ID = UR.ID WHERE UAR.ADMIN_ID = #{adminId} GROUP BY UR.ID

SELECT up.id id, up.create_time createTime, up.name name, up.uri uri, up.value value FROM UMS_ADMIN_ROLE_RELATION UAR LEFT JOIN UMS_ROLE_PERMISSION_RELATION URP ON UAR.ROLE_ID = URP.ROLE_ID LEFT JOIN UMS_PERMISSION UP ON URP.PERMISSION_ID = UP.ID WHERE UAR.ADMIN_ID = #{adminId} GROUP BY UP.ID
